quotes: A Healthy Mind keeps a healthy spirit
Keeping the world clean makes it go round
Sanitation helps us in more ways than one
Green is Life, Green is health
Improvement in our environment leads to improvement in our minds
A cluttered environment is a devils resting place
By Recycling we can change Tomorrow, Today!
Reuse the past, Recycle the present, Save the future
Be clean, be green, be a recycling machine
Recycle it all — no matter how small!
Pollution is merely a resource, that isn’t being used properly
When you refuse to reuse, It’s the Earth you abuse.
Maintain cleanliness,to gain health and happiness.
